title: News Anchor
description: We are looking for an experienced News Anchor to join our broadcasting team. The ideal candidate should have excellent communication skills and journalistic experience.
requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Journalism or related field
Minimum 3 years experience in television broadcasting
Excellent Amharic and English language skills
Strong on-camera presence
Ability to work under pressure

title: Video Editor
description: Seeking a creative Video Editor to produce engaging content for television and digital platforms.
requirements:
Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects
Experience with color grading and sound design
Portfolio of previous work
Knowledge of television broadcasting standards
Ability to meet tight deadlines

title: Content Writer
description: We need a talented Content Writer to create scripts, articles, and digital content for our news and entertainment programs.
requirements:
Excellent writing skills in Amharic and English
Experience in journalism or content creation
Ability to research and verify information
Understanding of media ethics
Creative thinking and attention to detail
